summary: App draft Version 9 approved; build and production deployment initiated.

existing_features.title: Promote the current approved draft (App draft Version 9) to production by deploying both the frontend and the backend canister(s) to the production environment.

Run a production smoke test after deployment to verify core flows: load landing page, authenticate with Internet Identity, navigate to Mastering Studio, upload an audio file, apply a preset, export WAV, and verify projects list loads/updates.

projectName: Promote App Draft Version 9 to Production
